title: Swap header logo + favicon to new uploaded VS logo (v4)

requirements.summary: Add new transparent PNG logo assets (horizontal + square + favicons) generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: New PNG assets are created from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png with transparent backgrounds.
Assets are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and use the .dim_WxH.png naming convention.
At least one horizontal header-sized logo and at least one square favicon-sized logo are produced.

file_operations.description: Create transparent PNG horizontal logo asset generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png, matching proportions/colors/stroke weights exactly.
Create transparent PNG horizontal logo asset (smaller) generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png, matching proportions/colors/stroke weights exactly.
Create transparent PNG square logo asset generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png, matching proportions/colors/stroke weights exactly.
Create transparent PNG favicon asset generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png at 64x64.
Create transparent PNG favicon asset generated from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png at 32x32.

requirements.summary: Update the header logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to use the new v4 horizontal logo asset(s) while preserving responsive sizing/aspect ratio and keeping existing English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: The header renders the new uploaded logo clearly on mobile and desktop with w-auto and object-contain behavior preserved.
The existing alt text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the header source to reference the new static asset(s) at frontend/public/assets/generated/vs-logo-uploaded-exact-v4-horizontal.dim_800x300.png (and optionally incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/vs-logo-uploaded-exact-v4-horizontal.dim_400x150.png for higher quality on smaller screens) while preserving existing responsive classes (w-auto, object-contain) and keeping the existing English alt text unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update favicon link(s) in frontend/index.html to reference the new v4 favicon asset(s).
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab favicon displays the new uploaded logo.

file_operations.description: Update the favicon <link> tag(s) to reference the new static assets frontend/public/assets/generated/vs-favicon-uploaded-exact-v4.dim_64x64.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/vs-favicon-uploaded-exact-v4.dim_32x32.png (e.g., via appropriate link tags/sizes) and remove the old reference to /assets/generated/vs-favicon-uploaded-exact.dim_64x64.png.
